short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay informed about latest tv shows in movies in your new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows you the latest news regarding new movies and tv series.
This extension will change your browser default search and new tab to Piezo.run which is powered by Bing.

features:
- see the latest movies news and information.
- see the latest tv series news and information.
- search a movie or a tv series to get its info in your screen.

privacy policy:
https://piezo.run/privacy

User terms and conditions
https://piezo.run/terms
